-f|--filter: --- run only matching module or test names
-r|--reporter: --- specify the reporter to use; if no match is found or no name is provided|a list of available reporters will be displayed
--require: --- specify a module or script to include before running any tests. (default: [])
--seed: ---  specify a seed to re-order your tests; if specified without a value|a seed will be generated
-w|--watch: --- watch files for changes and re-run the test suite
